description: Comprehensive index of all legal form templates for the Roscoe workflow engine

placeholder_convention.description: All templates use square bracket placeholders

forms.name: Standard MVA Complaint
forms.use_when: Standard motor vehicle accident with clear liability

forms.path: complaints/2022 Whaley MVA Complaint - Owner Reported Stolen_Template.md
forms.docx: complaints/2022 Whaley MVA Complaint - Owner Reported Stolen.docx
